moblocator.config.title: Mob Locator Configuration
moblocator.config.showInvisible.tooltip: Show invisible mobs on the locator bar (displayed in gray). Save settings to enable/disable Invisible Mob Color field.
moblocator.config.invisibleColor.tooltip: Color for invisible mobs when shown (default: Gray)
moblocator.config.blacklistedMobs: Blacklisted Mobs (The text fields are transparent. Be careful!)
moblocator.config.blacklistedMobs.toolti: Add mob names to prevent them from showing on the locator (e.g., Creeper, Iron Golem)
